ThingDef.label: fleshling
ThingDef.description: This horrible thing struggles to even move. Its body a distorted and disquieting version of a fetus. It chitters, shrieks and cries in a terribly human way while writhing on the ground.

ThingDef.label: emaciated thing
ThingDef.description: A gigantic, twisted, skeletal creature. Its taut emaciated form is also incredibly resistant to damage. Its razor-sharp horn fetches a huge price.\n\n Its yawning maw sucks at the air throat constantly swallowing in choked gulps.

ThingDef.label: horrible thing
ThingDef.description: Bloated stack of meat with weeping sores on its back that bulge with pale wriggling masses.

ThingDef.label: tiny translucent thing
ThingDef.description: A horrible translucent quadruped which warbles distressingly.

ThingDef.label: slugcat
ThingDef.description: A wriggling furless thing that should be horrific but is somehow incredibly cute.

ThingDef.label: howling thing
ThingDef.description: This horrible thing struggles to even move. Its body a distorted and disquieting version of a canine. It howls, shrieks and cries in a terribly canid way while writhing on the ground.

ThingDef.label: beak worm
ThingDef.description: This horrible thing squirms and caws. Its body a distorted and maggoty form. It caws and squirms with three snapping beaks.

ThingDef.label: flesh tick
ThingDef.description: A pale skittering creature that latches onto hosts to feed on their blood.

ThingDef.label: turgid spore
ThingDef.description: a pulsing orb bobbing gently in the air currents.

ThingDef.label: jellid beast
ThingDef.description: A great furless beast, ursine in posture. Its thick blubber and bones visible through the glistening translucent skin. Its eyeless face twists and turns seeking prey. It is startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.

ThingDef.label: rat
ThingDef.description: a tiny eyeless rodent with pale skin and segmented pattern to its back. it expells an earthy scent from pores on its sides.

ThingDef.label: writhing thing
ThingDef.description: kill it! Kill it! Kill It! KILL IT! KILL IT!.

ThingDef.label: greasy wool
ThingDef.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation, if only it was not so greasy... Wait is it moving?!

ThingDef.label: serpentine thing
ThingDef.description: An elongated reptile like creature, translucent skin, it's beautiful.
